justification: Little evidence of Team B’s mindset (consensus-trusting) beyond vague “high-variance swap.” B would highly value a Tier 1, ascending RB (Thompson), so acceptance likely higher. Offer contradicts Team A’s ceiling/volume preference by downgrading RB from Tier 1 to Tier 3 for a modest WR upgrade. All statuses fit, but strategic fit is poor. Rationale is generic, ignores tiers, playoff outlooks, and manager psychologies.
